Package lib.homies.framework.utils

Interface InventoryUtils

All Known Implementing Classes:
SpigotInventoryUtils
public interface InventoryUtils
A platform-agnostic interface for utility methods related to inventories. This service provides common operations for manipulating HomiesInventory instances.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    fill(HomiesInventory inventory, HomiesItemStack item)
    Fills an entire HomiesInventory with a specific HomiesItemStack.
    void
    fillBorders(HomiesInventory inventory, HomiesItemStack item)
    Fills the border slots of a HomiesInventory with a specific HomiesItemStack.
    List<HomiesItemStack>
    paginate(List<HomiesItemStack> items, int page, int perPage)
    Paginates a list of HomiesItemStacks, returning a sublist for a specific page.

  • Method Details

    • fill

      void fill(HomiesInventory inventory, HomiesItemStack item)
      Fills an entire HomiesInventory with a specific HomiesItemStack.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The HomiesInventory to fill.
      item - The HomiesItemStack to use as filler.

    • fillBorders

      void fillBorders(HomiesInventory inventory, HomiesItemStack item)
      Fills the border slots of a HomiesInventory with a specific HomiesItemStack. Assumes a standard 9-slot row inventory layout.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The HomiesInventory to fill the borders of.
      item - The HomiesItemStack to use as filler for the borders.

    • paginate

      List<HomiesItemStack> paginate(List<HomiesItemStack> items, int page, int perPage)
      Paginates a list of HomiesItemStacks, returning a sublist for a specific page. This method is platform-agnostic and only handles list slicing.
      Parameters:
      items - The full list of HomiesItemStacks to paginate.
      page - The 1-indexed page number to retrieve.
      perPage - The maximum number of items per page.
      Returns:
      A List of HomiesItemStacks for the specified page.
